titleStmt.title: The auction, or, A catalogue of some useful books lately published together with a summary of what is treated of in them.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Nathaniel, 1627-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Nathaniel Johnston. Entered as J785 in Wing under Nathaniel Johnson; cancelled in Wing, 2nd. ed. This work not mentioned in DNB article on Johnston.
Caption title and imprint; imprint probably false.
A satirical list of imaginary books.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
